name: College Girls Revenge on Crazy Boyfriends
name_original: College Girls Revenge on Crazy Boyfriends
description:
These College Girls are out for revenge on their crazy boyfriends and girlfriends. They throw cell phones and books to show their skills. Quite the temper tantrum. But they can't help it. Throw to knock down the obstacles. It's pay-back time!

Insane fun! Gather gold coins and unlock new characters and exciting levels.

HOW TO PLAY:

Tap lower right of screen to shoot, lower left to jump. Collect coins to unlock characters and levels.

- Amazing graphics
- Cool Sounds
- Fun Characters

Challenge your friends for highest score!

EXCITING FUN!!

Download 'College Girls Revenge on Crazy Boyfriends' now and have some fun.
